page.title: 08Recreation in Newark
page.content: A survey was carried out among different age groups, on the recreation facilities in Newark.The young thought: there are not enough facilities for the young or old.More restaurants, cafes and cultural shops are needed and places where they spend their free time.Entertainments,such as The Palace theatre and the cinema should be improved. According to middle-aged people no improvements need to be made. However, there should be more "night-life"and more variation in the facilities available.They also think that there needs to be more for the young. Older people are satisfied with their selection of facilities.
